youtube-desc: Informs you of a new YouTube video on a selected channel
title: Title
twitch-desc: Informs you of a new Twitch livestream on a selected channel
send-message-end: Send a message after the livestream has ended
stream-online-desc: This message will be sent when the livestream is online
stream-offline-desc: This message will be sent when the livestream is offline
channel-follow-desc: Informs you when someone follows a channel
channel-subscription-desc: Informs you when someone subscribes to a channel
channel-bits-desc: Informs you when someone sends bits to a channel
channel-ban-desc: Informs you when someone is banned from a channel
channel-unban-desc: Informs you when someone is unbanned from a channel
what-to-do-with-online-message: What to do with livestream online message?
youtube-video-published-desc: Informs you when a video is published on a channel
youtube-short-published-desc: Informs you when a short is published on a channel
file-uploader-plus: Due to a lot of abuse of the file uploader, this feature isn't available anymore without license. You can activate one in 'Home' tab.
